name: vercel

alias.title: Credential Alias
alias.description: Friendly name shown inside Openlane for this token.

apiToken.title: API Token
apiToken.description: Vercel personal or team API token with read access to projects and settings.

teamId.title: Team ID
teamId.description: Optional team identifier used if the token is scoped to a team.

projectId.title: Project ID
projectId.description: Optional project identifier to scope compliance checks.

environment.title: Default Environment
environment.description: Indicates which deployment environment should be queried first.

captureDeployHooks.title: Capture Deploy Hooks
captureDeployHooks.description: When enabled, deploy hook metadata is persisted alongside the integration.

metadataTags.title: Metadata Tags
metadataTags.description: Optional list of tags that categorize the projects pulled from Vercel.

description: Collect Vercel project and deployment context to support devops posture and drift detection workflows.
